name: Space Shooterio
description:
Hello Everyone,

Today I made my first game. Its name is Space Shooterio.

I use Gdevelop to create the game.

The game is classic Space Shooter game or Galaxy Attack.

I am just beginer, so I did this for simple and easy to play.

Enjoy the game and if you like, please donate me to have emotion for generating more better game.

Thank you and having fun!
